title: Elvis Presley Radio Tribute 1977 15 hours+ MP3
description:
I remember the day we heard the news that Elvis had died like it was yesterday.  I was seven years old and camping with my family.  Everyone at the camp ground had their radio's on and I remember sitting in the truck listening to the news.

In the days following, my dad had the reel to reel tape recorder running, recording the non stop tribute to Elvis on the radio.  He filled eleven reels and most of them are about an hour and a half.  These tapes sat on the shelf for 36 years until he transferred them to digital files.  He has been urging me to post them on the TPB for everyone to enjoy.

So here it is.  I will be posting a condensed MP3 version as well as the original WAV version for those who want better sound quality.  I hope many people will enjoy this.  Please seed generously
